mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter Regarding Dancing Lessons
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A letter addressed to Miss Minor Ray Munsey, Floyd, Va. from Anna Agnew, Hotel Floyd. The letter inquires if the recipient would be interested in dancing lessons, specifically ballroom dancing and tap.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Records and correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
